name: Flying Frags
description:
Flying Frags is an arena shooter where you the goal is to kill all the enemies on each level. You have 5 different weapons and 2 midair jumps to traverse all of the 8 abstract arenas and eliminate each dangerous enemy. The game currently costs $1.00, but will change to $2.00 once more levels are added. (if you bought it at $1.00 you won't have to pay for the price change)

DEVELOPMENT BY: TheSmashers

MUSIC BY: RoyaltyFreePlanet
